content:
Philipp Tölle is a passionate Solution Architect and Application Engineer. Striving always for the optimal solution in a given context.
Proper Software Development will ensure that your enterprise can trust the knowledge casted into your IT landscape. Future profitable growth will be build on top of a properly developed and maintained software foundation.
 Standard Software solves standard problems, but Standard Software will not differentiate you from your competition
